mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (writer, rest_id, title, content, reg_date, update_date) VALUES (#{writer}, #{restId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{regDate}, #{updateDate})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM review ORDER BY review_no DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{cpp}
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, update_date = current_timestamp WHERE review_no = #{reviewNo}
